text: 3.14: Ro 2.17; 2.23; 13.13Nde maaŋ muuŋgip harigi gumgi ga nzuav guigira ndavi shiv, nde zazera wari wo zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuarga tuavi ndiv ganɨnga. Nde maaŋ muuŋv, nde wari wo mbui ndɨkndɨgi gum tɨvir ndikndigɨ thari. Nde maaŋ muuŋv, nde fhura wari guiguigɨv, nden tɨvi mbatɨgi buni guari mbevi.
